name: Poison Resistance
description: Reduces damage while poisoned.

ranks.description: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage.
Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage.

name: Paralysis Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

name: Sleep Resistance
description: Reduces the duration of sleep.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

name: Stun Resistance
description: Reduces stun duration.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.
Reduces the duration of stun by 90%.

name: Muck Resistance
description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.

ranks.description: Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

name: Blast Resistance
description: Grants protection against blastblight.

ranks.description: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

name: Bleeding Resistance
description: Grants protection against bleeding.

name: Iron Skin
description: Grants protection against Defense Down.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 50%.
Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 75%.

name: Earplugs
description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

ranks.description: Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

name: Windproof
description: Grants protection against wind pressure.

ranks.description: Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Negates minor wind pressure and reduces the effects of major wind pressure.
Negates minor and major wind pressure.

name: Tremor Resistance
description: Grants protection against ground tremors.

ranks.description: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

name: Dungmaster
description: Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.

ranks.description: Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

name: Effluvial Expert
description: Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

ranks.description: Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

name: Heat Guard
description: Nullifies damage from heat.

name: Attack Boost
description: Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.

name: Defense Boost
description: Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.

name: Health Boost
description: Increases health.

name: Recovery Up
description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

name: Recovery Speed
description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

ranks.description: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

name: Fire Resistance
description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Water Resistance
description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Ice Resistance
description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Thunder Resistance
description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Dragon Resistance
description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.

name: Blight Resistance
description: Grants protection against all elemental blights.

ranks.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 50%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 75%.

name: Fire Attack
description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Water Attack
description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Ice Attack
description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has as maximum limit.)

name: Thunder Attack
description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Dragon Attack
description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

name: Poison Attack
description: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Paralysis Attack
description: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Sleep Attack
description: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Elemental buildup has maximum limit.)

name: Blast Attack
description: Increases the rate of the blast buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)

name: Normal Shots
description: Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

ranks.description: Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

name: Piercing Shots
description: Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

ranks.description: Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

name: Spread/Power Shots
description: Increases the attack power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

ranks.description: Increases the power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
description: Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)

ranks.description: Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 100% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

name: Critical Eye
description: Increases affinity.

name: Critical Boost
description: Increases the damage of critical hits.

ranks.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 35%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 40%.

name: Weakness Exploit
description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

ranks.description: Attacks that hit weak spots have 10% increased affinity, with an extra 5% on wounded parts.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity, with an extra 15% on wounded parts.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity, with an extra 20% on wounded parts.

name: Focus
description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

ranks.description: Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 20% and reduces charge times by 20%.

name: Power Prolonger
description: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.

name: Handicraft
description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauage. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

name: Critical Draw
description: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.

name: Partbreaker
description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.

name: Slugger
description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

name: Stamina Thief
description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

name: Master Mounter
description: Makes it easier to mount monsters.

ranks.description: Makes it easier to mount monsters and down mounted monsters.

name: Airborne
description: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.

name: Latent Power
description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

ranks.description: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Agitator
description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

ranks.description: While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 5%.
While active, grants attack +8 and increases affinity by 5%.
While active, grants attack +12 and increases affinity by 7%.
While active, grants attack +16 and increases affinity by 7%.
While active, grants attack +20 and increases affinity by 10%.

name: Peak Performance
description: Increases attack when your health is full.

name: Heroics
description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.

ranks.description: While active, increases defense by 50 points
While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 50 points.
While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 100 points.
While active, increases attack power by 10% and increases defense by 100 points.
While active, increases attack power by 15% and increases defense by 100 points.

name: Fortify
description: Temporarily increases your attack and defense every time you faint up to 2 times.

ranks.description: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

name: Resentment
description: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).

name: Resuscitate
description: Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.

ranks.description: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

name: Horn Maestro
description: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

ranks.description: Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.
Greatly increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

name: Capacity Boost
description: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

name: Special Ammo Boost
description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

ranks.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

name: Artillery
description: Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.

ranks.description: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

name: Heavy Artillery
description: Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.

name: Marathon Runner
description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).

name: Constitution
description: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.

name: Leap of Faith
description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.

name: Stamina Surge
description: Speeds up stamina recovery.

name: Hunger Resistance
description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time. However, does not work against cold environments that reduce stamina.

ranks.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 50%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 100%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

name: Evade Window
description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.

name: Evade Extender
description: Increases evade distance.

name: Guard
description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

ranks.description: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 30%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and redcues stamina depletion by 50%.

name: Quick Sheath
description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.

name: Wide-Range
description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

ranks.description: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with full efficacy.

name: Item Prolonger
description: Extends the duration of some item effects.

name: Free Meal
description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.

name: Speed Eating
description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.

name: Speed Sharpening
description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

ranks.description: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

name: Bombardier
description: Increases the damage of explosive items.

name: Mushroomancer
description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

ranks.description: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

name: Master Fisher
description: Improves your skill at fishing.

ranks.description: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

name: Pro Transporter
description: Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them.

ranks.description: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

name: Master Gatherer
description: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.

ranks.description: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

name: Honey Hunter
description: Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.

name: Carving Pro
description: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.

name: Divine Blessing
description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

ranks.description: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

name: Palico Rally
description: Powers up Palicoes.

ranks.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

name: Botanist
description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

ranks.description: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect or mushroom item per gather.

name: Geologist
description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

ranks.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.

name: Maximum Might
description: Increases affinity as long as stamina is kept full for a period of time.

ranks.description: Increases affinity by 40% as soon as the stamina gauge is full.

name: Slinger Capacity
description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.

ranks.description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.

name: Stealth
description: Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

ranks.description: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

name: Flinch Free
description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

ranks.description: Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback. Increases some Kinsect extract effects.
Prevents knockbacks and tripping. Increases some Kinsect extract effects.

name: Scoutfly Range Up
description: Expands your scoutflies' detection range.

name: Speed Crawler
description: Increases movement speed while crouching.

name: Jump Master
description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

name: Survival Expert
description: Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables like Sporepuffs or Wiggly Litchi.

name: Aquatic/Polar Mobility
description: Lets you move more freely in water. Also prevents you from being slowed down by terrain effects, such as deep snow.

ranks.description: Increases your evade window and prevents lowered movement speed.
Greatly increases your evade window and prevents lowered movement speed.

name: Cliffhanger
description: Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy, or when moving while grappling onto an enemy.

ranks.description: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 50%.

name: Blindsider
description: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

ranks.description: Increases the success rate of flash effects.

name: Scholar
description: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)

ranks.description: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

name: Entomologist
description: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.

ranks.description: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

name: Effluvia Resistance
description: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.

name: Scenthound
description: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.

name: Forager's Luck
description: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

ranks.description: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

name: Detector
description: Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.

ranks.description: Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

name: BBQ Master
description: Improves your skill at cooking meat.

ranks.description: Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

name: Tool Specialist
description: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.

name: Affinity Sliding
description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

ranks.description: Increases affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding.

name: Intimidator
description: Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)

ranks.description: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

name: Hasten Recovery
description: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

ranks.description: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

name: Super Recovery
description: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

ranks.description: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.

name: Poison Duration Up
description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

ranks.description: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

name: Adrenaline
description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

ranks.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

name: Stamina Cap Up
description: Increases stamina cap.

name: Critical Element
description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

ranks.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
description: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

ranks.description: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

name: Bludgeoner
description: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

ranks.description: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts ranged weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

name: Non-elemental Boost
description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

ranks.description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

name: Capture Master
description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.description: High chance of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Guard Up
description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

ranks.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

name: Guts
description: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).

ranks.description: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).

name: Master's Touch
description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

ranks.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

name: Nullify Wind Pressure
description: Negates all wind pressure.

name: Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
description: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

ranks.description: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

name: Critical Status
description: Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

ranks.description: Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

name: Good Luck
description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Bow Charge Plus
description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

ranks.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

name: Punishing Draw
description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.

ranks.description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.

name: Protective Polish
description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

ranks.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

name: Poison Functionality
description: Allows you to apply poison coatings.

name: Para Functionality
description: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.

name: Sleep Functionality
description: Allows you to apply sleep coatings.

name: Blast Functionality
description: Allows you to apply blast coatings.

name: Elderseal Boost
description: Increases the Elderseal of weapons and dragon ammo.

name: Great Luck
description: High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.description: High chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Carving Master
description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

ranks.description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

name: Elemental Airborne
description: Elemental damage increased for jumping attacks.

name: Igni Intensity
description: Only those who complete the rigorous witcher training are allowed to use the powerful magic of the Igni Sign.
